description: Get the best of both worlds with this reversible piece. Built with nylon ripstop cotton on one side and smooth nylon on the other, with a PrimaLoft® Black Eco insulated fill. Wear as your do-it-all 3 season staple, or layer underneath when the cold weather really sets in.
name: Topo Designs Insulated Shirt - Mens

specs.value: 5.5oz cotton nylon ripstop (68% cotton, 32% nylon ripstop; 100% nylon micro ripstop with DWR finish; 60g
